revised_title: Researches on Myohamatin and Histohemalins in Various Animals
tldr: The author investigates the distribution and properties of myohamatin and histohemalins, pigments found in animal tissues and organs. They use spectroscopy to analyze the spectra of various tissues and organs in invertebrates and vertebrates, discovering similarities in the spectra of organs and tissues, regardless of the presence of circulating haemoglobin in vertebrates.
